Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-31755 affecting package apparmor for versions less than 3.1.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-31755 affecting package apparmor for versions less than 3.1.7-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package apparmor is earlier than 3.1.7-1, affected by CVE-2024-31755
